Text: ooh,... thank you thank you, can't wait to try this out.
The game doesnt keep my profile. Every time i open  the game, there is only the ''Master Detective'' Profile... plz help :(

i encountered a bug in chapter 7: the coroner's office. whenever i click the cork board. the cursor disappears and the game freezes. i checked some forums and they said that some of the work arounds was to look for "flashInstall" folder in the game folder, unfortunately it's not there. i updated my flash player and shockwave but it didn't help.. thanks for the upload, though...
